title: Calendar â€“ Tough Level
description: Answer all questions. Each carries 1 mark.

questions.title: What day of the week was 15 August 1947?
How many odd days are there in 400 years according to the Gregorian calendar?
What day of the week was 1 January 1901?
If 1 January 2000 was a Saturday, what day of the week was 1 January 2001?
How many leap years are there between 1601 and 2000 (both inclusive)?
1 January 1800 in India (after Gregorian adoption) fell on which day?
If 1 January 1900 was Monday, what day of the week was 1 January 2000?
How many leap years were there in India between 1801 and 1900 (both inclusive)?
If 1 January 1754 was a Monday in India, what day was 1 January 1800?
Using the post-1753 calendar, 26 January 1950 (Republic Day of India) fell on which day?
